titleInfo.title: Nashville Jubilee at War Memorial Auditorium (18770)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on brown) announcing Nashville Jubilee featuring Webb Pierce, Roni Stoneman, Bobby G. Rice, Bobby Lewis, Jan Stark, Joe Heathcock, Max Powell, Tennessee Travelers, and Debbie Pierce at War Memorial Auditorium on May 14. Poster features metal photoplates of Webb Pierce, Roni Stoneman, Bobby G. Rice, Bobby Lewis, Jan Stark, and Joe Heathcock. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/25329/

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
